main.name: Behnam Ghafouri Project
main.description: I am a full stack developer .I use different frameworks to develop both the front and back ends of a website or application.I can tackle projects that involve databases, building user-facing websites, or even work with clients during the planning phase of projects.
main.bio: Hi! I am Behnam Ghafouri, a full stack developer focused on crafting great web experiences. Designing and Coding have been my passion since the days I started working with computers but I found myself more into web design/development.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Full Stack Web Developer
work.description: Member of the development team who add and edit features to the in house  applications in different frame works. Frame works are .NET, Angular and Nodejs.Usually supervisor adds the required features in the azure DevOps and based on daily meetings we must demo our progress. If the new module meets the required functionality then I send pull request for rechecking and merging it to the master branch.Task are usually about add or delete the SQL tables and then fix their relations to the new ones and old ones also store procedures.

work.title: .NET Developer
work.description: .Net server-side application with SQL database.Improve web application pages to be more convenience for data entry employees.Using ajax for dropdown lists them data entry employees could work without reload pages.Customise the application for every new project for deferent procedures and documentation

work.title: Data Base Admin
work.description: Import the Microsoft Excel packing lists of received material in refinery warehouse directly to MS-SQL Server Database which reduced the number of data entry employees.Design queries in Microsoft Access environment to create reports for warehouse management which significantly improved the efficiency of information retrieval and report generation.

work.title: Help Desk
work.description: Support and troubleshoot Hardware/Software issues.Active directory support, managing group policy user policy applications
